body: Build 834 implements Boros Charm. I just compiled Build 837, downloaded the new images and was looking for it - didn't find it, though.
author: [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/)
title: Boros Charm not present in Build 837?

comments.body: Shadowborn Apostle and Loxodon Gatkeeper are present in 837
comments.author: [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/)

comments.body:
The Boros Charm script file was added in https://code.google.com/p/magarena/source/detail?r=cbdb2a7f056552d6ae2e54510c0439671a2acd15 but the file is empty. So I've removed it as it is non functional.

**Status:** Fixed

content:
_From [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/) on March 16, 2014 08:28:55_

Build 834 implements Boros Charm. I just compiled Build 837, downloaded the new images and was looking for it - didn't find it, though.
